question: Which state assembly passed a resolution against the Ordinances on Agriculture Marketing, introduced by the Centre?
explanation:
The Punjab Assembly has unanimously passed a resolution tabled by Chief Minister Amarinder Singh against the Centreâ€™s farm ordinances.
The assembly also passed resolution against the proposed Electricity amendment Bill 2020. As per the Chief Minister and the assembly, the ordinances were against the rights of the farmers and the regime of Minimum Support Price.
